医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
短期接触空气污染可能会增加中风风险根据美国神经病学学会医学杂志《神经病学》在线期刊 2023 年 9 月 27 日发表的一项荟萃​​分析，短期暴露于空气污染可能会增加中风风险。短期暴露定义为中风后五天内发生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Short-term-exposure-to-air-pollution-may-increase-中风-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Short-term-exposure-to-air-pollution-may-increase-中风-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a67afaad-0341-484b-bb9b-165f5258c171 Wed, 27 Sep 2023 21:01:27 -0400 Short-term exposure to air pollution may increase stroke risk
超级西红柿：科学家设计出富含氨基酸和黄酮类化合物的水果西班牙研究人员利用顺基因工程来生产营养丰富的西红柿，其黄酮类化合物和支链氨基酸含量更高，为植物性饮食的人们提供潜在的好处。该研究表明有望提高其他作物的营养含量，解决营养不良和健康缺陷问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Supercharged-tomatoes-Scientists-engineer-fruits-packed-with-amino-acids-and-flavonoids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Supercharged-tomatoes-Scientists-engineer-fruits-packed-with-amino-acids-and-flavonoids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2cf268b9-f436-4fcb-88b0-341eb82a9073 Wed, 27 Sep 2023 20:54:00 -0400 Supercharged tomatoes: Scientists engineer fruits packed with amino acids and flavonoids
HMS 研究人员将领导耗资 1.04 亿美元研究细菌和抗生素耐药性美国卫生与公众服务部今天宣布，哈佛医学院研究员 Johan Paulsson 将领导一项耗资 1.04 亿美元的多机构项目，研究细菌和抗生素耐药性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/HMS-researcher-to-lead-24104-million-effort-to-study-bacteria-and-antibiotic-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/HMS-researcher-to-lead-24104-million-effort-to-study-bacteria-and-antibiotic-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50338052-a0f9-4eb6-a0e5-908d766f87fe Wed, 27 Sep 2023 20:51:53 -0400 HMS researcher to lead $104 million effort to study bacteria and antibiotic resistance
研究详细介绍了中性粒细胞在确保脑癌生存中发挥的关键作用路德维希癌症研究中心的一项研究首次详尽地分析了脑肿瘤中的中性粒细胞免疫细胞，这些肿瘤包括在大脑本身发育的神经胶质瘤，以及从肺部、乳腺癌和皮肤扩散到那里的癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Study-details-the-key-role-played-by-neutropils-in-ensuring-survival-of-brain-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Study-details-the-key-role-played-by-neutropils-in-ensuring-survival-of-brain-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72a5ebc5-4220-48d0-bcd0-232e1b30dc45 Wed, 27 Sep 2023 20:45:02 -0400 Study details the key role played by neutrophils in ensuring survival of brain cancers
研究发现失业后流产或死产的风险增加研究人员发现，孕妇或其伴侣失业与流产或死产风险增加之间存在联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Study-finds-increased-risk-of-miscarriage-or-stillbirth-following-a-job-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Study-finds-increased-risk-of-miscarriage-or-stillbirth-following-a-job-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb2b07cf-611c-42b5-adfe-c83f1825c83e Wed, 27 Sep 2023 20:39:20 -0400 Study finds increased risk of miscarriage or stillbirth following a job loss
蚯蚓使全球农作物增产1.4亿吨在《自然通讯》杂志上发表的一项具有里程碑意义的研究中，研究人员发现，蚯蚓使全球谷物和豆类作物产量大幅增加 1.4 亿吨。这强调了它们在农业中的关键作用，并强调了可持续土壤管理实践的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Earthworms-boost-global-crop-product-by-140-million-tons.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Earthworms-boost-global-crop-production-by-140-million-tons.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5792089e-25bf-4d11-9a0a-bf8b6e6e43b0 Wed, 27 Sep 2023 20:36:00 -0400 Earthworms boost global crop production by 140 million tons
UKHSA 向 CARPHA 捐赠先进的基因组监测设备这是加强全球基因组监测以追踪大流行和潜在流行的新变异和病原体的重大一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/UKHSA-donates-advanced-genomic-surveillance-equipment-to-CARPHA.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/UKHSA-donates-advanced-genomic-surveillance-equipment-to-CARPHA.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c1c5b44-7b1c-44ee-bfd3-21cea71bffb6 Wed, 27 Sep 2023 16:45:00 -0400 UKHSA donates advanced genomic surveillance equipment to CARPHA
种族歧视与青少年不健康的皮质醇模式相关科学家们已经知道，种族歧视造成的压力与许多慢性健康状况有关，但对于哪种类型的歧视危害最大却知之甚少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Racial-discrimination-linked-with-unhealthy-cortisol-patterns-in-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Racial-discrimination-linked-with-unhealthy-cortisol-patterns-in-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba540e99-188e-4992-8379-948956d15ae7 Wed, 27 Sep 2023 16:30:00 -0400 Racial discrimination associated with unhealthy cortisol patterns in adolescents
KFF 健康新闻“健康是什么？”：医疗补助更加混乱在错误的计算机程序错误地确定他们不再符合资格后，联邦官员已指示至少 30 个州恢复医疗补助和儿童健康保险计划，覆盖 50 万人，其中包括儿童。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-More-Medicaid-messiness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-More-Medicaid-messiness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f629db43-6f19-4b24-9dcb-90e080e1688f Wed, 27 Sep 2023 16:22:58 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': More Medicaid messiness
随着新冠感染人数的增加，疗养院仍在等待疫苗70 岁的退休按摩治疗师黛布·威提克 (Deb Wityk) 住在爱荷华州乡村的一家名为司布真庄园 (Spurgeon Manor) 的疗养院里，她说：“新冠病毒在疗养院里的日子可不好过。”她曾两次感染这种疾病，她渴望获得新批准的疫苗，因为她患有慢性淋巴细胞白血病，这削弱了她的免疫系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/As-covid-infections-rise-nursing-homes-are-still-waiting-for-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/As-covid-infections-rise-nursing-homes-are-still-waiting-for-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70e7e140-467f-4c3d-9e0a-6f6dbcfc698b Wed, 27 Sep 2023 15:41:59 -0400 As covid infections rise, nursing homes are still waiting for vaccines
